casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Wilson, Appellant, v. Trimble, Admr., et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Wilson v. Trimble (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 334.]

(No. 96-292 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided October 7, 1998.) Cox & Stein, P.C., and Edward J. Cox, Sr., for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William A Thorman III, Assistant Attorney General, for appellees.

*335The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
